title: .ovh.org Domain Migration
description: Migrate your {{serviceName}}.ovh.org subdomain to another hosting in your account.

warning.title: Warning
warning.description: This action will move your .ovh.org domain to the selected hosting. Associated files and configurations will be migrated.

success.title: Migration Initiated
success.description: The migration of your {{source}}.ovh.org domain to {{destination}} has been started.
success.note: This operation may take a few minutes.

empty.title: No Destination Hosting
empty.description: You don't have another active hosting to migrate your .ovh.org domain to.
empty.note: Order a new hosting to perform a migration.

error.migrate: Error during migration. Please try again.
